Metadata.title: Galopen
Metadata.description: A macOS menu bar app that shows your calendar events and auto-opens meeting URLs.

Hero.description: Galopen lives in your macOS menu bar, showing upcoming calendar events and automatically opening meeting URLs right when you need them.

menuBar.title: Menu Bar Native
menuBar.description: Lives quietly in your menu bar. Click to see today's and tomorrow's schedule at a glance.

autoOpen.title: Auto-Open Meetings
autoOpen.description: Automatically opens Zoom, Google Meet, and Teams links at a configurable time before the meeting starts.

countdown.title: Countdown Timer
countdown.description: See how many minutes until your next meeting, right in the menu bar. Configurable display threshold.

calendars.title: Calendar Filtering
calendars.description: Toggle visibility of individual calendars. Works with all calendars synced to your Mac.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All data stays on your Mac. No accounts, no servers, no tracking. Uses the native macOS EventKit.

lightweight.title: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Built with Tauri for minimal resource usage. Small download, fast startup, low memory footprint.

CTA.title: Get started in seconds.
CTA.description: Download Galopen, grant calendar access, and you're good to go. Free and open source.
